pages.title: Brews
pages.text: Use a glass bottle to retrieve your potion when the cauldron splutters. Certain ingredients may need to draw power from an $(item)Altar$(). More brews may be recovered as your $(l:brewing/introduction#expertise)Expertise$(/l) grows

pages.title: Effect & Modifiers
pages.text: A brew consists of one or more $(l:brewing/effects)effects$(/l) with modifiers and a $(l:brewing/dispersal)dispersal$(/l) method, also with modifiers.$(br)Modifiers to an effect or dispersal method must be added in-order before the effect is added.

pages.title: Capacity
pages.text: Each effect added to a brew will require a certain amount of storage space. Special $(l:brewing/capacity)ingredients$(/l) are used to add such capacity to a brew, and they must be added in order to have a cumulative effect.$(br2)Multiple effects can be added to a brew, but there must be sufficient capacity for all of them combined.

pages.title: Step-by-step
pages.text: 1. Increase $(l:brewing/capacity)capacity$(/l)$(br)2. Add $(l:brewing/modifiers)modifiers$(/l)$(br)3. Increase $(l:brewing/main/power)power$(/l)$(br)4. Increase $(l:brewing/duration)duration$(/l)$(br)5. Add $(l:brewing/effects)effect$(/l)$(br)6. Repeat from 3$(br)> Bottle or continue$(br)7. Increase $(l:brewing/dispersal#extent)extent$(/l)$(br)8. Increase $(l:brewing/dispersal#lingering)lingering$(/l)$(br)9. Set $(l:brewing/dispersal)dispersal$(/l)$(br)> Bottle or do $(l:brewing/rituals)ritual$(/l)
